description: Discover the best hotels in Maleny, Australia. Find exclusive deals and luxury accommodations.

hotels.title: Boutique Sunshine Coast Hinterland Escape
hotels.description: Connect with nature at the family-run Whispering Valley Cottages Maleny, where you will find hiking trails, resident donkeys and complete tranquility. Hidden within 46 acres of Sunshine Coast hinterland, this peaceful retreat is the perfect getaway. Enjoy a romantic picnic by the lake or luxurious in-room massage, or bring the whole family along to mingle with the cheeky donkeys, and spend afternoons exploring the beautiful property gardens.

seo.title: Hotels in Maleny - Australia Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Find the best hotels in Maleny, Australia with exclusive deals. Book your perfect getaway with up to 60% off.
